This magical banner stands largest on any battlefield. While holding a titan's standard, you can use the following ability.

Activateâ€”Titan's Stature 1 (concentrate)

Frequency once per minute

Effect The magical banner causes a rapid surge of growth. A Medium or smaller ally within the banner's aura becomes Large for 1 round. Its equipment grows with it but returns to its natural size afterwards. While Large, the ally is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny).
